column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.3
#T_SP=webanno.custom.RoleAnnotation|roles
#Text=Mr.
#Text=Barros Melet (Chile) (spoke in Spanish): We\r
#Text=thank the delegation of France for convening this open\r
#Text=debate and we appreciate the statements made by the\r
#Text=briefers.
#Text=We extend special greetings to the civil society\r
#Text=representative from our region.
#Text=Chile aligns itself with the statements delivered by\r
#Text=the representatives of Canada, on behalf of the Group of\r
#Text=Friends of Women, Peace and Security, and of Panama,\r
#Text=on behalf of the Human Security Network.
#Text=We welcome the report of the Secretary-General\r
#Text=(S/2017/861) and express our support for the initiatives\r
#Text=related to the voluntary compact to end sexual\r
#Text=exploitation and abuse, which Chile has signed, the\r
#Text=appointment of the victims' rights advocate, the Senior\r
#Text=Women Talent Pipeline initiative, and the strategy\r
#Text=for the equal participation of men and women in\r
#Text=the Organization.
#Text=Chile was a Latin American pioneer in developing\r
#Text=an action plan for the implementation of resolution\r
#Text=1325 (2000) in 2009, under the administration of\r
#Text=President Bachelet, conscious of the important role\r
#Text=played by women as agents of change and forgers of\r
#Text=peace.
#Text=The second national action plan is now in full\r
#Text=implementation, with a strong emphasis on education\r
#Text=and staff training.
#Text=The new plan includes the recommendations of\r
#Text=the Security Council and international best practices\r
#Text=in that area, making strides in creating indicators to\r
#Text=measure progress on specific objectives that facilitate\r
#Text=and promote women's access within peace operations at\r
#Text=all levels of action and decision.
#Text=We have incorporated\r
#Text=a gender perspective in doctrine, planning and carrying\r
#Text=out of Chile's peace operations in all four thematic\r
#Text=areas and goals established by the United Nations:\r
#Text=prevention, participation, protection and relief, and\r
#Text=recovery.
#Text=Chile co-sponsored resolution 2242 (2015),\r
#Text=promoted by Spain, and is a founding member of the\r
#Text=Women, Peace and Security National Focal Points\r
#Text=Network.
#Text=The Network's last meeting in September\r
#Text=reaffirmed its commitment to continuing to support\r
#Text=and develop women's participation in decision-making\r
#Text=in all areas.
#Text=Equal opportunity and the empowerment of women\r
#Text=has been a key pillar of our Government's gender\r
#Text=agenda, which has made solid progress such as the\r
#Text=incorporation of gender equality in electoral reform,\r
#Text=and which requires that at least 40 per cent of candidates\r
#Text=running for Congress be women.
#Text=At the international\r
#Text=level, we promote and protect women's rights in\r
#Text=armed conflict, especially given the need to increase\r
#Text=women's participation in decision-making related to\r
#Text=international peace and security.
#Text=That is how we bolster\r
#Text=women's presence in peace missions both in Haiti and\r
#Text=in Colombia's special political mission.
#Text=In the field\r
#Text=of prevention, we are developing academic initiatives\r
#Text=based on the women and peace and security agenda,\r
#Text=incentivizing the inclusion of a gender perspective in\r
#Text=sustaining peace activities.
#Text=The inclusion of women in peace operations raises\r
#Text=awareness about women's and children's issues on\r
#Text=the ground in such operations, and their presence has\r
#Text=helped prevent sexual exploitation and abuse.
#Text=In that\r
#Text=context, women both in peace operations and within\r
#Text=communities have played a central role in sustaining\r
#Text=peace and protecting women's rights.
#Text=We echo the\r
#Text=sentiments of previous speakers in affirming that one\r
#Text=of the greatest challenges we face is increasing the\r
#Text=participation of women in peace operations and, in\r
#Text=particular, ensuring the presence of gender advisers in\r
#Text=such operations.
